text: If I wanted to kill myself, I'd climb your ego and jump to your IQ.
You have the right to remain silent because whatever you say will probably be stupid anyway.
I'm not saying you're dumb, but you took a ruler to bed to see how long you slept.
You're as useless as the 'ueue' in 'queue'.
If laughter is the best medicine, your face must be curing the world.
You're the reason the gene pool needs a lifeguard.
I'd agree with you but then we'd both be wrong.
You bring everyone so much joy when you leave the room.
I thought of you today. It reminded me to take out the trash.
You're not stupid; you just have bad luck thinking.
If I wanted a joke, I'd follow you into the bathroom and watch you take a leak.
You're as bright as a black hole, and twice as dense.
You have the charm and personality of a wet sock.
You're proof that evolution can go in reverse.
If I threw a stick, you'd leave, right?
You're as sharp as a marble.
You're the human version of a participation trophy.
If your brain was dynamite, there wouldn't be enough to blow your hat off.
You're as useless as a screen door on a submarine.
You have the personality of wallpaper paste.
You're the reason shampoo has instructions.
You're as welcome as a fart in a spacesuit.
You're the human equivalent of a typo.
You're as useless as a knitted condom.
You're the reason we can't have nice things.
You're as effective as a white crayon.
You're the human version of period cramps.
You're as useless as a chocolate teapot.
You're the reason the middle finger was invented.
You're as sharp as a bowling ball.
You're the human version of a migraine.
You're as useless as a solar-powered flashlight.
You're the reason people lock their doors at night.
You're as welcome as a skunk at a lawn party.
You're the human version of a hangover.
You're as useless as a waterproof towel.
You're the reason warning labels exist.
You're as sharp as a spoon.
You're the human version of a speed bump.
You're as useless as a screen door on a battleship.
You're the reason the word 'idiot' exists.
You're as welcome as a mosquito at a nudist colony.
You're the human version of a flat tire.
You're as useless as a glass hammer.
You're the reason the phrase 'bless your heart' exists.
You're as sharp as a sack of wet mice.
You're the human version of a dead battery.
You're as useless as a one-legged man in a butt-kicking contest.
You're the reason the slow clap was invented.
You're as welcome as a rattlesnake at a square dance.
You're the human version of a broken pencil: pointless.
